website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably roomy tent by a top brand in outdoor gear with bonus features for added convenience.
pros: Has a battery-powered wall switch that delivers LED lighting with various modes
Also has a fan, plus large windows that provide ample air movement
Fairly easy to set up and take down
cons: Some quality control issues reported, including broken poles and holes in the floor material
Leaks around the rainfly and seams noted

customer_reviews.title: Withstands Wyoming summer storms!
customer_reviews.text: We camp in northern Wyoming for 10 days and have done so for the past 40 years. This is the best tent we have ever had. It rained hard, hailed hard, and the wind blew hard and this tent held up. Not one drop of water came into the tent. It is very easy to set up - all of the poles and their locations on the tent are color coded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are camping in a desert.  Pray it doesn’t rain.
customer_reviews.text: Having read dozens of Amazon reviews, FakeSpotting them all, and growing up with Coleman products, I thought this was a solid pick. A complete waste of money in a rainstorm. I am sitting here, first day of using it, with a moderate rainfall for the last hour. What I have in my tent are active drips under 3 windows and the “outlet” entry (although it isn’t being utilized). Easy to put up, but worthless if it rains. Already set up UPS to come pick it back up this week for a return. Garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Home in the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: A couple of weeks after receiving this tent, we took it camping for a week. It went up quickly and easily, and was quite roomy. The first night it rained. In fact, it rained every day. Cold, windy and nearly constant rain, sometimes heavy. This tent kept us dry and cozy! The Prairie Breeze is one of the best tents that I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Solid durable tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is spacious and very open and very tall. No crouching or ducking needed while in it! It has a lot of airflow during the day if your windows are zipped open. The only downfall of this tent is the side walls. They must be staked down or else the wind will push it over. It seams like it is made of very solid material that will last well over a decade. I would also add that the bag it comes in is too big for it. But I have always been very good at packaging tents and sleeping bags into their original container.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Great for our family of 4
customer_reviews.text: We have two small children, one of which still requires a pack n' play. We also had 2 full size SlumberJack cots, and a kids air mattress. We had tons of room on the inside to play when we got poured on. The tent has been set up 3 times, all 3 times it has rained, and we have only gotten small amounts of water in the corners, but nothing that's unexpected. Ventilation is great and the switch at the door to turn on and off the fan and light is great too. I would definitely recommend this tent if you're looking for something large enough to hold your family with plenty of room for gear and sleeping arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Glamping heaven
customer_reviews.text: We will have to update this review after more testing with rain. Somehow got lucky with a week of perfect weather. We found set up to be simple and straight forward with two people. The fan is only useful on a still day with the rain fly removed, but we agree with others that the light and switch are a charming touch. My spouse didn't like the zipper design of the door, but I had no problem with it, and it makes sense to me for potential rain protection. So far this has been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pbxnt

customer_reviews.title: This tent is NOT 14'x10  it is 13'4"x 7'!
customer_reviews.text: The tent went up fairly easily - need two people - it probably took 30 minutes. Nice tent, sturdy and well made. But the size differential between what the description states versus the real size is a deal breaker - I'm sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious, light weight and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! We only set it up once st home in three kitchen with my 8 year old granddaughter, lol. It's easy to set up, the quality is absolutely perfect and (really important to me), I'm able to stand straight up on every corner with my 6 ft and 2 inches tall body :) It has lots of light coming in and the tent is super light weight. We haven't used it outside yet, but will soon. It's super spacious. I know it's been rated as a 9 person tent, but we're only going to use it for 2 or 3 people, maybe even a 4th. Plenty of space for everything. Exactly how we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Boonstoppel

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, spacious, full-featured cabin tent.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent; it is roomy, quite spacious and comes packed with a number of thoughtful features like the ceiling fan/light combo tied to an actual light switch near the door, the numerous large windows to the optional partition allowing us to form two separate rooms inside. My only complaint is that the seams at the base of several of the windows leaked a small amount of water but nothing that a bit of seam sealer couldn't address this keeping is watertight afterwards even when it rained heavily all day. I am very happy with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Macajuel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent !
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is huge . Never owned a tent before this was quite easy to put up took us 30 minutes with a practice run .all the pieces are color coded from poll to the tent super easy to follow directions. Quality is nice very spacious and lots of ventilation. Plenty of space for more people even with 2 queens air mattresses . Like the switch by the door for the fan/light nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, nice design if you’re not a minimalist.
customer_reviews.text: First trip to state natural area, camped on improved site with electric and water. Tent went up easy with another person helping (after getting home and putting up 3rd time I did it by myself easily). Vertical walls make it a huge space, loved it. Had wind and rain, 20-30 mph wind gust no problem, 2 small tent seam leaks but rain fly no problems. Light very convenient and nice bonus, fan moved air but don’t expect ceiling fan type of performance. Opening for extension cord was very convenient. Overall great tent so far, plan on buying some for my adult children to use on their family trips.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Langley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our family upgraded to this tent from the Coleman Montana! I love this tent. It was very easy to set up! There is plenty of room for two queen beds and a cot! Awesome height in the tent! Light and fan are awesome!!! The one thing I don't like is the zip door! It's hard for the kids to get in and out of. The previous tent had the hinge door and it was my favorite part of the tent! Kids are slowly learning how to open without ruining the zipper! Was very easy to take down and put away as well! I had to tak my husband into this tent...he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KEB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have set it up twice now and slept in it for 4 nights. 5 stars for now as the weather was perfect with no wind so cannot state how this tent holds up to rain or wind. Came as expected and for having a bag that you can actually get the tent back into deserves 6 stars! The one thing I notice and should mention is to be careful connecting the fan/light to the ceiling. Make sure you have a good grasp of the connector plate before trying to twist the fan/light into place.
customer_reviews.author: Kooter

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this so far...3 months as my only residence.
customer_reviews.text: I literally have lived in the tent for 3 months now. As long as all is zipped up it is very good for rain, even here in the northwest of Washington. In warm weather it gets very hot but cools quickly thanks to the open area between the net ceiling and the rainfly. In cold weather, wind will come through from the top if gusty. I've been in the 30s in this puppy and of course it doesn't hold heat since well, its a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: The built in fan and light are awesome. 1st time set up took about 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: The built in fan and light are awesome. 1st time set up took about 30 minutes with just me and my 12 year old son. 2nd time was even faster. The rain fly and stabalizing the tent is a little more challenging, but manageable. I'll be curious to know how it will hold up in the rain. SO SPACIOUS for our family of 5. Actually, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!! Lots of Room!!
customer_reviews.text: Three things I wanted from a tent: Quality Large Easy to setup/takedown This tent is all three. MUST HAVE!!!! I put a queen size air mattress and two large pack n plays in this tent, and still have plenty of room!! Everyone is jealous when I show up with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: J Francis

customer_reviews.title: Fan and Light inoperable
customer_reviews.text: Please do not make the mistake I made. Even though I set this tent up prior to our camping trip, I didn't check to see if the fan and light worked. BIG MISTAKE!! NEITHER ONE WORKED!! I trusted that it would, but that turned it to be a mistake. We went all the way to the camp site, set things up, and the rest is history. The text itself was very nice and spacious. With two people it only takes 10 or 15 minutes to get set up.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent but pole broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and fairly easy to set up considering its size. The overhead light and wall switch are nice. BUT, one of the shock cords inside the fiberglass poles broke the first time we used the tent, and it was under VERY normal conditions of use. Basically, we were just easing the pole out of the sleeve when taking the tent down, and we didn't even know anything had broken until we went to fold the tent up and suddenly felt that there was something rigid still left inside. It was one section of the fiberglass pole that had broken off. That doesn't make you feel too happy when you just spent $300 on the tent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent!!!! My absolutely favorite. Roomy, practical, and the fan and overhead light is fantastic. Good heavy material, privacy and good ventilation from the windows while keeping out insects. Only thing is my light/fan won't stay attached to the top. It just hung there - I'm not sure if that was a defect or the design. Otherwise, I wanted to extend our camping trip another day just to use the tent another day - I loved it that much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Truesdale

customer_reviews.title: That it will not withstand the rain.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it leaks when it rains. Used it over Xmas in Tucson, it withstood the wind but it leaked in several places especially from above it leaked on my duvet while sleeping. I like the tent but for the money getting wet is not why I bought this tent.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: OMG Love this tent so much space. easy to put up. can't wait to be able to set up with out the rain flap so I can watch the sky at night.
customer_reviews.author: L Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The tent is extremely easy to set up. The screen windows are wonderful. There was a lot of thought put into the details of this tent. The overhead fan and light are very nice and the room divider is also a great touch creating two rooms in one tent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!  Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Easy to set up. Very durable. Lights are very good.....fan, not so much. I backpacked this in to a disaster relief site and had no backup for our base camp. This tent was perfect for the mission.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: It was already used and then repackaged like new.
customer_reviews.text: My tent was a very well repackaged used tent. It was dirty with glitter on the inside. The zipper was broke and the light/fan looked like it was rolled down a rocky cliff. We brought it camping and couldn't even use it. We had to come home.
customer_reviews.author: savanna

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! It's been great for family camping trips with our baby and dog. We easily fit a queen air mattress and have plenty of room for the dog or more people too. It's really not difficult to put up, but definitely easier with 2 people. We had a couple of really windy days and the tent swayed quite a bit, but stayed intact.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Richter

customer_reviews.title: This tent was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent was very easy to set up, even having to put it up for the first time in the complete dark. the light switch is really handy and the fan seems to work well circulating the heat when you are using propane heaters inside. Awesome amount of room inside this tent, plenty of room for lots of gear and multiple people to stay in comfortably
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY LENSING

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far but have only used it for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleased so far but have only used it for one trip. Set up and take down very easy, incredibly roomy and held up to heavy rain. To be honest though, it has a lower quality feel to it, the zipper caught a few times. I was hoping for better quality for what we paid. Hope it last a while,
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is everything we thought it would be. It has held up in wind and rain. Plenty of room for my wife and our kids. The only problem we have ever had with it is sometimes it takes a while to find a flat place large enough to set it up when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman has created a great tent. This has to be the first tent ...
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I don't leave reviews. However, that being said. Wow! Coleman has created a great tent. This has to be the first tent that has gone back in the bag. I was able to set the tent up by myself in about 30 mins. at a slow pace. The hardest part was attaching the rain fly (due to the high wind). I would recommend this tent for a family. Lots of room. Has room divider and front door mat. This tent hands down meets and exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent. Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent. Easy to setup. Used it on a trip to the smoky mountains and it performed flawlessly. Quick delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: PAR 3

customer_reviews.title: High performance
customer_reviews.text: I received this tent on May 6. Today is May 22 and this tent has seen rain, high winds along with a hail storm. I am so pleased with its performance. Water did get inside, but that was due to the high winds blowing the rain sideways. When the water ran under the tent, I was sure it would be soaked inside, it was dry! I am so impressed and happy with this tent. The dogs and I enjoy hanging out in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps a lot of ppl
customer_reviews.text: This tent is pretty roomy and doesn't take too long to put up (not like the old days). We slept 2 adults and 5 kids just fine.
customer_reviews.author: zanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent, it looked complicated to setup
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent, it looked complicated to setup, but once you get the hang of it you can set it up in less than 10 min. I tested the waterproof and can say it works surprisingly very well; it doesn't let water in, or seep at all. This tent was exactly what I was looking for a long camping trip with 4 large guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My family of five love this tent. I have a bit of a tent problem, I own five. This has become my favorite. It fits all of us, our stuff, and even has room left over for our Great Dane and her dog bed. good amount of ventilation and enough privacy. I do not like the door placement as it limits the ways to set up sleeping bag locations.
customer_reviews.author: RDarling

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, Very large. Not for cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Huge in size and nicely constructed. Easy set-up for two persons but would be very difficult for one person to set up. Not a cold weather tent as the ceiling is screen with a rain fly.
customer_reviews.author: Jlwater

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent love the room. Fits 2 Adults and 4 kids under 12 just fine. enough room for my XXL cot, queen air mattress, and twin air mattress with enough room to walk around in. Just like a little cabin. I love not having to duck down so much like in a dome tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This tent was easy to put up and is very roomy. I love that we can stand up in it. My parter is 5"11" and easily stands up. We can fit 6 cots in here with room to walk around.
customer_reviews.author: ufgatormom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I set the tent up for the first time this weekend. It was easy to assemble and was we designed as it relates to the windows and storage ouches. However, the light and fan do not work. I purchased this tent specifically for the light and tent. Without the amenities of the light and fan this tent is not worth the money I paid for it. I could have purchased the same sized tent for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My family are all very tall (except me) this tent will give us all more room to move around and will do well in NW weather. The bonus is a lite and small fan in the center. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Yep- great family tent
customer_reviews.text: Down poured on her maiden voyage and everyone is dry- even the dog. Plenty of room and easy to use. Recommend using fly ties and stakes , especially if in a tropical storm like we were. We used a ground cloth (not included) but recommend. I am 6’1” - plenty of head room. Had 2 queens and a Great Dane - all with plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: My best buy on tents
customer_reviews.text: My best buy on tents. I love this tent and how durable it is and it did very well with the strong winds. Set up was a breeze and in under 15 minutes.the light and fan were added accessories that completes the camping gear
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Easy to set up, plenty of room. The light was a huge plus for getting things situated at night in a campground with no electricity. The fan works but don't expect miracles as its more for ventilation than cooling. Overall loved the tent, the other tent families were slightly jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TENT
customer_reviews.text: Lots of large vents, less than 20 minutes to set up or take down , nice LED overhead light, plenty of room at 7ft ceiling height --would reccomend it-----
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great tent , very durable, very roomy since it has the “ cabin” or straight walls instead of typical slanted tent sides... great design .. easy set up
customer_reviews.author: Rboyatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for a family of 4 camping. Very tall and simple to put up. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Its everything I wanted PLUS there is a switch at the opening that turns an overhead light on which I didn't realize came with the tent! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Family Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this family tent! Fairly easy setup, though I wouldn't want to do it in the dark. HUGE interior - easily slept 5 of us with plenty of personal space for bags, etc. a vestibule would have been nice, but not a big deal. Very ventilated when windows and door are opened to screens. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tent, tall enough for me to walk around it, the light and fan are a nice touch, it wasn't to hard to set up, but you do need to people.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Green

customer_reviews.title: it's indeed easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I got this tent last month,it's indeed easy to setup.i am fully satisfied with its quality and more than enough space for my family(5).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Easy to setup and plenty of room for me, my wife, and our three kids. The fan doesn't do a whole lot but that is to be expected for its size. If your tent site is gravel, get some metal stakes and some padding for under the tent. We left the rain fly off because of good weather and enjoyed looking at the stars at night.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! It made it through a couple of rain storms. Zipper at door gets a little hard to zip if there's too much tension. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Melish

customer_reviews.title: Huge tent.
customer_reviews.text: Coleman quality. Easy setup. This is a huge tent. It seems even larger than I expected which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good tent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, easy tear down. You may want to put a tarp or mat underneath when you set it up. A couple rocks/sticks poked into my feet when walking around inside. All in all, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent. Easily sleeps two Queen mattresses. Good circulation. Goes up very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice tent! The fabric is nice and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice tent! The fabric is nice and you can tell it will hold up well. The light inside is really nice. Only problem we had is when we first pulled it out of the package one of the cords within the pole was already broken. Not the end of the world but definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Meierhofer

customer_reviews.title: we love coleman products
customer_reviews.text: we love coleman products. just tested this out for a week in august and it lived up to its name. very roomy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: amdata

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love Coleman! The flooring on this tent is of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have has the larger Coleman! We absolutely love Coleman! The flooring on this tent is of great quality. We camp year round, yes in the snow too, and we really get our use from our tents!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Banker

customer_reviews.title: The fan is kind of lame but it's not bad for running on 4 C ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit all of us, stayed dry. The fan is kind of lame but it's not bad for running on 4 C batteries. We may by a Coleman battery pack to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marles

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: If you have a group of 4 or more get this tent. Relatively waterproof and good ventilation. Fits 2 queen size air mattresses with room to spare. It would have been nice to have a full screen front door with a hinge but it's all good. Worth the money. 250 on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: VERY LARGE TENT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent so I could get my girlfriend to enjoy camping. We have plenty of room in this giant tent.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Williams

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Tent was extremely easy to set up with 2 people. There is plenty of room inside. We had 2 queen air mattresses and 2 people in sleeping bags for a total of 6 in the tent. It doesn't get much better than this tent for camping.
customer_reviews.author: joe9512

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tent. Big, solid, and well-made. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Menagerie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TENT FOR CAR-CAMPING
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a camping trip in Yellowstone. First time out with this tent and found it to be very easy to put up/take down. It has a built in light/fan that is handy, especially at night. We did not experience wind or rain, so I cannot speak to how it holds up under those conditions. It certainly performed well for my family over six nights at 7,800 feet. It is noteworthy to mention the relatively high sides and center - I am 6' and never had to stoop, even at the edges. That was nice. I recommend this tent for anyone that is car-camping and needs/wants a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Sootan Bodroski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this tent! We found it easy to set up with the two of us and we have some physical limitations, and move a bit slow. Best purchase of the year for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arminda Denn

customer_reviews.title: Go King Kong with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Mega-sized. Seems durable after a one week outing. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: James Panning

customer_reviews.title: My family of 6 loved this tent last summer
customer_reviews.text: My family of 6 loved this tent last summer. We had it up for four months straight on our campground and it never had problems. We sealed all the seams and the fabric the first weekend, and had no leaks the whole time and we live in the Pacific Northwest. Great investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Best cabin tent EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Best cabin tent EVER!! Poured rain and not a drop inside. GREAT size. No condensation. Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. P.

customer_reviews.title: If size matters, this tent delivers.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT tent. Only complaint is the design of the ceiling mounted light - which broke quickly. The rest of this tent is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: good quality tent
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and plenty of room would recommend
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Tent !!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tent. Lots of space, comfy and easy to set it up!!! I can buy a dozen of them!! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: CaroContreras

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this tent, the fan connector not as strong as hoped for, but was easily fixed
customer_reviews.author: morris parsley

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Experience !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Near perfect experience. My purchase arrived earlier than estimated by vendor. This tent was easier to set up than I expected. It took me less than 30 minutes to set up and I only needed a little help from my wife with lifting up the center of the tent. Breaking down and packing this tent was easier than the set up. A lot of color coded or pre-marked tent items made the set up quick & simple. I will be using this tent later this month, and I don't see any possible problems. The interior light and fan system is a big plus. Lots of windows, and the door is wide.
customer_reviews.author: Raul , Downey, Ca.

customer_reviews.title: It withstood 60 mph winds and didn't leak in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It withstood 60 mph winds and didn't leak in the rain. Hooking up the outriggers is mandatory but it has held up to the beating it took
customer_reviews.author: Carl Neumann

customer_reviews.title: i love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I havent taken this camping yet, but iv put it up in my yard and my kids slept in it..i love it..its very roomy and the light switch is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kachina andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a give for my son and daughter in law to use with the two grandkids when we camp together. They absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: NOT an instant tent.
customer_reviews.text: Took our granddaughter on her first camping trip. Tent was almost impossible for two experienced campers to put up . Plastic spikes broke. Instructions were terrible. Tossing it in the back of the garage permanently. Total waste of money. Would give it zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Put up before I went camping was easy the second time around. It was a great tent
customer_reviews.author: Jose Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent, plenty of room.. Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great design easy setup and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great design easy setup and lots of room. Had to setup during rain, went up easy and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McDermott

customer_reviews.title: GREAT tent, lots of room for a family of ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT tent, lots of room for a family of 6! Love the light, love the door (it's a partial D, which is much better than a full D), love the ease of setup. Looking forward to many enjoyable camping trips with this tent! But, the kids get their own tent, this is for my wife and me. It's like a cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hander

customer_reviews.title: but it was great!! Easy set up and tear down and ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this tent once as of this time, but it was great!! Easy set up and tear down and lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Shingleton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up but does take a little time ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up but does take a little time very roomy the light is nice and heavy duty poles no water in tent after big rain storm does not like hi wind good buy
customer_reviews.author: byron s

customer_reviews.title: Tons of room!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome!! It took me and my girlfriend bout half hour to put up the first time. Easy once you get it figured out. We spent 7 days in it on a recent deer hunt and slept comfortable and stayed dry. Tons of floor space and head room. The light in it last the whole hunt (using sparingly of course) . I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value on a great tent. Well constructed and easy to set up. Very water tight and roomy. Good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Harold W. Melius

customer_reviews.title: Best tent on the market
customer_reviews.text: wow! I thought this would be difficult to set up but I did it all by myself (5'7'' guy). Lots of head room & a zippered fabric room separator for added privacy. Very nice tent :-)
customer_reviews.author: Roger Russell Griffin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great tent,great price
customer_reviews.text: Huge tent, fit 2 Queen sized air mattresses, a pack and play, and all our bags and still had extra room. Easy to setup. Fan and light are great, but the clips that hold the fan up broke when I tried to hook it up. Fan still works though. All in all would definitely recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a lot of Space and excellent Tent. We did a lot of research and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite a lot of Space and excellent Tent. We did a lot of research and finally decided to settled for this. Glad we did that. Love the design or cabin shape, which allows you to walk around the corners without having your head touching the top of the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Russell N.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet setting up. You do need too ppl. However cheaper elsewhere. Check first before buying
customer_reviews.author: Modern WoodShop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent. Nice quality all around and very easy set up. Would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whigham

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome!! Only rained twice since sleeping in it so far, and no leaks yet! Set up is very easy, the built-in light and the fan are so great. The light is so much brighter than I expected, so at nighttime you will no longer need to use any flashlights to see around inside your tent. Love how many windows there are, and how big it is inside! Literally have no complaints about this tent. Would absolutely recommend to anyone!! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Miesch

customer_reviews.title: We took this beach camping to Homer Spit, Alaska ...
customer_reviews.text: We took this beach camping to Homer Spit, Alaska. It as our first time using the tent. We staked it well according to instructions, and placed it to minimize wind. The rain started pouring and the wind was howling. Three to four tents around us collapsed in on itself or blew down the beach. Ours held fast and stayed dry with no additional tarping. There was one tent similar to ours that had not been staked well or at all that did collapse in on itself. As with any tent it is imperative to take the time to stake and secure the rain fly appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weatherman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful face, ugly soul
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tent to look at, but the light/fan is pointless and the interior fails to include any loops to hang an alternate light. The poles are poorly bunjeed together and feel destined to break.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brady

customer_reviews.title: It's nice & roomy fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: It's nice & roomy fancy looking. I used it twice this year & we all love it. There is no complain so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cwong

customer_reviews.title: The tent is great! the light and fan aren't worth a crap
customer_reviews.text: The tent is great! the light and fan aren't worth a crap, so definitely bring something else for those resources or you will be miserable. Everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ Girl

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up tent
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box and the tent leaked, woke up to a wet air bed, very easy to set up tent.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bullion Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: it's comfy and roomy and makes a nice home away from home. It held up great in a windy rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: songbird

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. The straight walls give you a lot of extra room. Screen ceiling provides awesome view of the night sky to fall asleep too. Easy to set up and tear down. Rain fly provides great protection from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: David Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!! It's huge, and not hard to get up. Two people was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: BettyJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! Perfect size, and we can stand right up anywhere in it. It feels like a regular room not a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Conny L James

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest tent I have had This tent has more sf then my 2nd bedroom in my house
customer_reviews.author: james newland

product_meta.title: Coleman Prairie Breeze Lighted Cabin Tent, 9-Person
product_meta.description: With its spacious design, LED lighting, and reversible fan, the Coleman Prairie Breeze 9-Person Lighted Cabin Tent makes the campsite feel like home. This cabin tent is guaranteed to keep you dry thanks to a WeatherTec system that uses patented welded floors, inverted seams, and a covered zipper to seal out the water. The integrated fan system provides cool comfort on hot days, while the built-in LED lighting provides bright overhead illumination that's perfect for reading a book or studying a trail map. Designed to withstand rugged outdoor conditions, this tent is constructed from durable Polyguard fabric that endures seasons of use. Setup is simple thanks to the snag-free continuous pole sleeves and Insta-Clip suspension that secures the tent poles with a snap. A range of other convenient amenities--including storage pockets, six oversized windows, and an E-port for routing electrical power--round out this fully featured camping tent.
feature_bullets: 9-person cabin tent makes you feel at home with built-in LED lighting and fan system
WeatherTec system and rainfly keep tent interior dry and comfortable
Easy setup with snag-free poles and Insta-Clip suspension
Compatible with CPX 6; can be powered by 4 D batteries or a rechargeable cartridge (both sold separately)
14 x 10 ft. interior accommodates up to 2 queen-sized airbeds
